business.headline: Mutual fund SIP vs PPF: What Rs 1 lakh a year can earn in 15 yearsPPF is a government scheme with a current interest rate of around 7.1% per annum. On the other hand, SIPs typically offer higher interest when invested over the long term, especially in equity mutual funds. But they carry some risk, as returns depend on the market.

Explained: Why Muthoot Finance shares fell over 8% todayMuthoot Finance stock price: Muthoot Finance, one of India's largest gold loan companies, has seen its share price decline by 14% in the past five trading sessions. The stock is also down 7% over the past month.

Mutual fund inflows hit in March. Trump tariffs to blame?The largest outflows were seen in debt mutual funds, where investors pulled out Rs 2.02 lakh crore, possibly due to end-of-year financial needs by institutions and ongoing global uncertainty.

Zerodha CEO Nithin Kamath's money advice: 'No shortcuts to getting rich'Nithin Kamath shared a video with a powerful message—earning more doesn't mean you're saving more. In fact, higher income often leads to more spending on gadgets, clothes, dining out, or things meant just to impress others.

Trump tariffs, trade war fears could bring your loan EMIs down further this yearBorrowers could emerge as the unexpected winners if global headwinds linger and domestic growth slows further, with the RBI likely to step in again to lower the key interest rates.

Wall Street crashes, Dalal Street rallies: 5 things investors should knowStock market today: Dalal Street's leading indices rallied sharply, defying a global sell-off sparked by Wall Street's overnight crash. Here are the key factors behind today's stock market rally.

Mutual fund inflows fall for March by Rs 4,221 crore, shows AMFI dataEquity mutual fund inflows dropped by Rs 4,221 crore in March, falling to Rs 25,082 crore from Rs 29,303 crore in February 2025, as per data released by the Association of Mutual Funds in India (AMFI).

TCS shares fall after disappointing Q4. Check latest price targetsTCS share price: Despite a muted Q4, brokerages back TCS with revised targets, betting on deal wins, margin levers, and recovery prospects to drive medium-term gains.

Sensex jumps 1,400 points: 3 things to know about Dalal Street rallyShare market today: A surprise rally may have lit up the screens, but with volatility still lurking and trade risks unresolved, investors would do well to tread carefully through this temporary pocket of optimism.

Sensex up by 1,300 points, Nifty above 22,500 as markets cheer tariff pauseStock market today: The S&P BSE Sensex surged 1,353.59 points to 75,200.74, while the NSE Nifty 50 gained 443.70 points to 22,842.85 as of 9:43 am.

Stock market today: Will Sensex, Nifty open higher on 90-day pause on tariffs?Sensex, Nifty today: Early signs suggest a positive start. Gift Nifty futures were trading at 22,933.5 at 8:20 am, showing a 2.5% jump from Nifty 50's Wednesday close of 22,399.15.

TCS to delay salary hike? Check what top management said after Q4 resultsTCS reported a net profit of Rs 12,224 crore for the fourth quarter of FY25. This is a 1.7% drop compared to Rs 12,434 crore reported in the same quarter last year.

entertainment.headline: Empuraan box office: Mohanlal, Prithviraj's film storms past Rs 100 crore in IndiaMohanlal and Prithviraj Sukumaran's L2: Empuraan zoomed past Rs 100 crore at the domestic box office. On Day 15, the film witnessed a decline, earning only Rs 0.70 crore.

Sushmita Sen's sister-in-law Charu leaves Mumbai, is now selling clothes onlineSushmita Sen's sister-in-law, Charu Asopa, leaves Mumbai after facing a financial crisis. The actor even sold off her clothes online for extra money.

Indian, not pan-Indian: Sunny Deol on evolution of Indian cinemaJaat star Sunny Deol has been busy promoting his new film. During a recent media event, the actor spoke about the growing trend of pan-Indian films.

Emraan Hashmi on his son's cancer diagnosis: My entire world flipped in 12 hoursActor Emraan Hashmi recounted the harrowing day his son, Ayaan, was diagnosed with cancer. The life-changing event occurred unexpectedly during a family brunch in 2014.
Emraan Hashmi on singer KK: No substitute for certain talentActor Emraan Hashmi recently remembered the late singer KK and said that his voice was godsent. KK died in May in 2022.

Sunny Deol's Jaat is a parody of all his hit movies...and himselfSunny Deol returns to the big screen with 'Jaat', a film echoing the style of classic B-grade cinema. Packed with action and nostalgia, the film aims to capture the essence of a bygone era.

Mobland star Mandeep Dhillon 'would love to see Shah Rukh Khan in Guy Ritchie film'Mobland star Mandeep Dhillon expressed her desire to see Shah Rukh Khan in a Guy Ritchie film, as she shared her Bollywood obsession during an interview. Anson Boon, her co-star, is equally excited about the idea and ready to explore Indian cinema while working on Ritchie's spontaneous and thrilling sets.

Trisha shares cryptic post about online toxicity, calls it 'anonymous cowardice'Actor Trisha Krishnan shared a cryptic post on Friday hinting at the toxicity on social media. She is currently seen in Good Bad Ugly, starring Ajith Kumar.

Rajamouli 'thrilled' at RRR's mention as Oscars adds Best Stunt Design categoryFilmmaker SS Rajamouli was thrilled after The Academy gave his film 'RRR' an honorary mention as it introduced Best Stunt Design category. The Academy included 'RRR', 'Mission Impossible' and 'Everything Everywhere All at Once' in the announcement poster.

Gippy Grewal's Akaal faces backlash for alleged misrepresentation of Sikh CommunityThe latest Punjabi film Akaal is in troubled waters after Sikh leader Baba Bakshish Singh condemned it for hurting Sikh sentiments. It stars Gippy Grewal, Nimrat Khaira and Nikitin Dheer.

Chhorii 2 review: Nushrratt-Soha's film fights social evils but where's the scare?Released-Fri Apr 11, 2025The much-anticipated sequel 'Chhorii 2' promised to blend horror with social issues but left audiences wanting more. The film struggles to deliver the intended chills, leading to a lacklustre experience.
Grey's Anatomy actor Eric Dane, 52, diagnosed with ALSActor Eric Dane has announced his ALS diagnosis in a statement to PEOPLE, expressing gratitude for his family's support.

Actor Nitanshi Goel halts ramp walk, touches Hema Malini's feet, hugs Sushmita SenIn a touching moment at a Mumbai fashion show, Laapataa Ladies actor Nitanshi Goel paused her ramp walk to pay respects to veteran actor Hema Malini. Additionally, she also hugged Sushmita Sen, who was also present at the event with her model Rohman Shawl.

Jaat box office Day 1: Sunny Deol, Randeep Hooda film off to a decent startSunny Deol is back with 'Jaat', following the massive success of 'Gadar 2'. The film opened with moderate earnings, marking a stark contrast to his previous blockbuster.

Good Bad Ugly box office Day 1: Smashing opening for Ajith Kumar's film in IndiaAjith Kumar's 'Good Bad Ugly' opened strong at the box office on Day 1. The film surpassed the opening day numbers of Ajith's previous movies, 'Vidaamuyarchi' and 'Thunivu'.

Hrithik Roshan 'afraid, nervous' about turning director: I'm back in kindergartenActor Hrithik Roshan is set to don the director's hat for 'Krrish 4'. At a recent event in the US, Roshan opened up about the uncertainties and challenges that come with this new role.

Sushmita Sen attends event with ex Rohman, his reaction to paps' request goes viralActor Sushmita Sen and her ex-boyfriend Rohman Shawl were seen together at an event, stirring curiosity about their relationship. Despite their 2021 breakup, their public appearances keep fans speculating.

RRR gets honorary mention as The Academy announces new Stunt Design categoryDirector SS Rajamouli's RRR, starring Jr NTR and Ram Charan, got a special mention as The Academy introduced a new category - Stunt Design - to honour best action choreography. The award will be included in the 100th Oscars in 2028.

Ranveer Allahbadia discusses 'low phase' with Emraan Hashmi in new podcastYouTuber and podcaster Ranveer Allahbadia talked about his 'low phase' with actor Emraan Hashmi in his new podcast. The actor had a candid conversation about friendships in Bollywood and how 'friend' is a misused term in the industry.

general news.headline: China hits back with 125% tariffs on US goods, will 'ignore' any more Trump leviesTrade tensions soared as China raised tariffs on US goods to 125%, hours after Donald Trump hiked duties on Chinese imports to 145%, excluding Beijing from a broader tariff pause.

Vanishing daughters: Haryana forms task force, 300 abortion centres lose licenceThe string of actions comes after an investigation by India Today flagged a booming female foeticide racket in Haryana, which has seen a decline in the state's sex ratio at birth.

DMK Minister removed from party post for vulgar comparisons of Hindu tilaksTamil Nadu Minister K Ponmudi made a vulgar joke in a public forum, which compared Hindu 'tilaks' with sexual positions. The comment sparked outrage, with even party leader Kanimozhi condemning the remark. The DMK removed him as deputy general secretary.

Tahawwur Rana questioned by NIA, focus on Headley's India contact, Pak links  Live UpdatesWith Tahawwur Rana securely in its custody, the NIA is questioning the 26/11 plotter about his involvement in the conspiracy to commit terrorist acts alongside notorious figures such as David Headley.

Unilateral bullying, says Xi Jinping in 1st reaction to US's 145% tariffMeeting with Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez in Beijing, Xi Jinping stressed the need for deeper cooperation between China and the EU amid the growing trade war with Washington.

Who was Agustin Escobar, Siemens Spain CEO who was killed in Hudson chopper crash?A private helicopter carrying Siemens Spain CEO Agustin Escobar and his family crashed into the Hudson River, killing all six aboard, including three children. Authorities have cited mid-air structural failure.

Drone videos show execution of Ukrainian POWs by men identified as Russian troopsTwo drones — one Ukrainian and one Russian — recorded the scene from high above the southern Ukrainian village of Piatykhatky. The Associated Press managed to get both videos. They offer very different versions of what happened next.

Is 26/11 plotter David Coleman Headley a double agent shielded by US?India has taken 26/11 terror-attack conspirator Tahawwur Rana into its custody. Though the US has extradited Rana, it seems to be dragging its feet on the extradition of key plotter David Coleman Headley, a bigger fish. Is Headley a double agent who the US is not ready to hand over to India?

Attackers deserve Pak's highest honour, Tahawwur Rana told David Headley: USIn an official statement on Tahawwur Rana's extradition to India, the US Department of Justice disclosed fresh details about the former Pakistan army officer and his links to David Headley.

Nitish Kumar and Chandrababu Naidu: From Modi's bitter rivals to trusted alliesIn a sense, both Nitish Kumar and Chandrababu Naidu have made political survival an art form, one where a suitable elasticity in approach ensures longevity in power.

Nothing is purely business now: Jaishankar on India factor in US-China tariff warThe foreign minister's remarks came days after US President Donald Trump temporarily eased tariffs on several trading partners, including India, only to slap China with steeper levies.

Sushmita Sen's sister-in-law Charu leaves Mumbai, is now selling clothes onlineSushmita Sen's sister-in-law, Charu Asopa, leaves Mumbai after facing a financial crisis. The actor even sold off her clothes online for extra money.

PM briefed about gangrape of 19-year-old in Varanasi, orders strict actionAccording to a statement from the Uttar Pradesh government, PM Modi instructed the officials to take the "strictest possible action" against those involved and to ensure such crimes are prevented through strong administrative and policing measures.

Big leadership announcement expected following Amit Shah's Tamil Nadu visit?Amid leadership speculation, Tamil Nadu BJP braces for major changes following Union Home Minister Amit Shah's visit, with Annamalai's future uncertain and AIADMK potentially gaining a larger role in the NDA alliance.

Hunger strike, protest march: Thousands of sacked Bengal teachers hit streetsThe protesters, who marched to the School Service Commission office, demanded the segregation of 'genuine' and 'tainted' candidates who took the 2016 SSC examination.
Grey's Anatomy actor Eric Dane, 52, diagnosed with ALSActor Eric Dane has announced his ALS diagnosis in a statement to PEOPLE, expressing gratitude for his family's support.

Universities to be replaced by AI? Here's what the godfather of AI saidKnown as the Godfather of AI, Geoffrey Hinton has pointed out that AI is likely to take over the role of human tutors. While he expressed concern for universities, he also highlighted the great opportunity it presents for learners.

Delhi property dealer shot dead in car on way to gym, 8-10 rounds firedThe victim, Rajkumar Dalal, had left his home around 7 a.m. to go to the gym when unidentified assailants opened fire on his Toyota Fortuner, police said.

First images of Tahawwur Rana, in chains, being handed over to NIA team in USThe visuals show Tahawwur Rana, in chains, being escorted by US Marshals in what seems like an Army airbase. The 26/11 attacks plotter was extradited to India on Thursday.

Virat Kohli angry with Patidar? RCB star's animated chat with coach goes viralRoyal Challengers Bengaluru lost their home game against Delhi Capitals on Thursday. Virat Kohli, seemingly upset with the captaincy decisions, was seen having an animated chat with Dinesh Karthik.

Hindu boy, Muslim girl harassed in Bengaluru in alleged moral policing incidentA Hindu boy and his Muslim classmate were allegedly subjected to moral policing by five young men in Bengaluru. The group allegedly tried to assault the boy and filmed the duo.

Is Kolkata new Dhaka? BJP claims driver forced to remove saffron flag from busThe video, which has been widely circulated by BJP leaders on social media, shows a visibly distressed bus driver being surrounded and allegedly coerced into taking down a saffron flag.

sports.headline: CSK vs KKR Live: Captain Dhoni returns to lead the Kings against KnightsChennai Super Kings (CSK) vs Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) Live Score, IPL 2025: MS Dhoni's return as CSK captain has only added an additional jolt of surprise and excitement to IPL 2025, and his first challenge comes up against a familiar rival KKR.

Priyansh Arya reveals sole regret from heroic hundred vs CSKPriyansh Arya hit a terrific hundred vs CSK in the IPL 2025. After the dust settled on the PBKS vs CSK game, Priyansh spoke about his only regret from the game.

Salah signs contract extension with Liverpool after months of exit rumoursMarking an end to months of intense exit rumours, Mohamed Salah has penned a contract extension that will keep him at Liverpool beyond the 2024-2025 season.

MS Dhoni's cheeky jibe at KKR coach: The traitor is hereIPL 2025: MS Dhoni's return as CSK skipper brought a warm reunion with Dwayne Bravo, but not without a playful jab — calling his former teammate and now KKR mentor a "traitor" ahead of their big clash.
What difference can MS Dhoni's return as captain make to CSK?MS Dhoni returns as the Chennai Super Kings captain in the match vs KKR. What difference can he make to the sinking ship this season?

PSL bans Corbin Bosch for one-year after last moment withdrawal to play IPLCorbin Bosch has been handed a one-year ban by the PCB and PSL after pulling out of the league, marking a strict move to discourage players from backing out after being drafted. Bosch was roped in by Mumbai Indians as in injury replacement for IPL 2025.

Manchester United's Andre Onana slammed by Paul Scholes for 'terrible' Lyon errorsAndre Onana's costly mistakes denied Manchester United a first-leg win, as Lyon held them to a 2-2 draw in the Europa League quarter-final, leaving all to play for at Old Trafford.

CSK turn to talisman MS Dhoni amidst dwindling form in IPL 2025Chennai Super Kings are once again under the captaincy of MS Dhoni after Ruturaj Gaikwad was ruled out of the competition due to a fracture. They will take on a strong KKR side who have the ability to thrive on slow turning tracks.

Watch: RCB's Tim David shows KL Rahul's 'my ground' celebration to du PlessisKL Rahul's emotional return to Chinnaswamy turned into a statement performance as his unbeaten 93 powered Delhi Capitals past RCB—fuelling fan chatter around his celebration and even sparking a post-match recreation of the same from Tim David.

Rain helped DC? Dinesh Karthik opens up after RCB lose back-to-back home matchesIPL 2025: Mentor Dinesh Karthik said that Royal Challengers Bengaluru lost momentum after rain arrived in the second half of the Delhi Capitals' innings on Thursday at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
Jawaharlal Nehru University: Brains trustTeaching and research go hand in hand at the institute which is proud of its activist tradition.
